name: 知乎 隐私政策 弹窗隐藏 Zhihu Privacy Popup Confirm Hiding
description:
隐藏知乎隐私政策确认弹窗并恢复正常滚动浏览。
Hiding (ignoring) Zhihu privacy popup modal confirm for normal browsing.
additional_info:
副作用为，部分其他弹窗可能会被误伤部分功能，以及由于未对弹窗予以相应，仅隐藏，故回答时上传图片等弹窗功能无法使用(JS层级限制)。
Side effects include hiding other modal popups by chance,  and failures of some posting functions such as uploading  pictures because it just hides the popup modal and does not response to it anyway, which results in these function implementation being stuck in JS.

2018-4-29
更新匹配规则，使规则应用于各种子域名。
